C

checkEmailValidity(String) - Method in interface com.infinum.selection.service.ICredentialsService
Checking if provided email address have valid format - user@domain.com
For email address to be valid it must consist of three parts: local part, at sign and domain part.
checkPasswordValidity(String) - Method in interface com.infinum.selection.service.ICredentialsService
Checking if provided password have valid format - must be at least 8 characters long and must have at least one digit.
com.infinum.selection.service - package com.infinum.selection.service
